mapper.select: SELECT SUM(ix.`weight`*os.`fraction`) AS `fraction` FROM `index` ix LEFT JOIN in_op io ON io.`iid`=ix.`id` LEFT JOIN `option` os ON os.`id`=io.`oid` WHERE ix.`id`=#{ixid} AND os.`id`=#{osid}

select qi.qid,qtn.name as qtn_name,b.name as b_name,ix.id as iid,ix.name as ix_name,o.id as oid,o.name as o_name from qu_in qi left join questionnaire qtn on qi.qid=qtn.id left join batch b on b.id=qtn.batch left join `index` ix on ix.id=qi.iid left join in_op io on io.iid=ix.id left join `option` o on o.id=io.oid where qi.qid=#{qid}

select qi.qid,qtn.name as qtn_name,b.name as b_name,ix.id as iid,ix.name as ix_name,o.id as oid,o.name as o_name from qu_in qi left join questionnaire qtn on qi.qid=qtn.id left join batch b on b.id=qtn.batch left join `index` ix on ix.id=qi.iid left join in_op io on io.iid=ix.id left join `option` o on o.id=io.oid where qi.qid=#{qid}
select sum(fraction) as fraction from general where userid=#{userid} and userid2=#{userid2} and quid=#{quid} and batch=#{batch}
